title: Did Trey Gowdy Say He Was ‘Madder Than Hell’ at Pelosi’s COVID-Relief Remarks?
subtitle: The former Republican Congressman responded with outrage at remarks the Democratic House Speaker made in December 2020.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: In December 2020, Fox News contributor Trey Gowdy said he was "madder than hell" at remarks made by Nancy Pelosi about COVID-19 relief funding.
